column1:
Which field in the TCP header is used to detect duplicate segments?
  • A) Sequence Number
  • B) Header Length
  • C) Urgent Pointer
  • D) Reserved

Which TCP option is used to expand the maximum window size?
  • A) Timestamp
  • B) Window Scaling
  • C) MSS
  • D) Selective Acknowledgment

What is the primary purpose of delayed acknowledgments in TCP?
  • A) Reduce retransmissions
  • B) Combine acknowledgment with data
  • C) Minimize header overhead
  • D) Prevent congestion collapse

Which algorithm helps control congestion by reducing the congestion window after a packet loss?
  • A) Nagle's Algorithm
  • B) TCP Reno
  • C) Slow Start
  • D) Fast Retransmit
